level.text: The Superintendent [Commissioner], pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

The proposed rules shall be submitted to the Council for a 45-day period of review, excluding Saturdays, Sundays, legal holidays, and days of Council recess. If the Council does not approve or disapprove the proposed rules, in whole or in part, by resolution within this 45-day review period, the proposed rules shall be deemed approved.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Banks organized under federal law, application of District law, see ยง 26-710.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-142
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-142, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 26-731.
